H0.text: where does creatine come from in the body. Kidneys

H1.text: where does creatine come from in the body. Pancreas

H2.text: where does creatine come from in the body. Skeletal Muscle

H3.text: where does creatine come from in the body. liver

A4.text: with the remainder synthesized in the kidneys.

A5.text: with the remainder synthesized in the liver.

A6.text: Muscles have a short-term store of energy in the form of creatine phosphate which is generated from ATP and can regenerate ATP when needed with creatine kinase.
